attributes.action: Make 2022 the year we end this pandemic by helping to #VaccinateTheWorld.
attributes.additional_details:
The Omicron variant has shown that the only way we can end this pandemic is if we help #VaccinateTheWorld. 

The UK must actively support global and equitable access to COVID-19 diagnostic tests, treatments, and vaccines. This could be through the WHO coordinated Access to COVID-19 Tools (ACT) Accelerator or in partnership with individual countries.

If it's the latter, support must be personalised to the needs of the country; they will know the problems and have the solutions.
attributes.background:
UK should offer the following support:
- Vaccine donations & sundries e.g. PPE, needles etc
- Donated vaccines exp. date >3 months
- Supply chain, infrastructure, regulate supply & avoid surges
- Vaccine patent waivers
- £ support
- Address unrest
- Consider other diseases e.g. HIV, malaria

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure what you mean by, or what you'd like the Government to do about

- Supply chain, infrastructure, regulate supply & avoid surges
- £ support
- Address unrest
- Consider other diseases e.g. HIV, malaria

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, or you might like to sign this petition

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596403
